admin/vtex-vtex-ads.common.active.title: Active
admin/vtex-vtex-ads.common.quantityAdmin: Enter a value greater than or equal to 1. By default, 1 ad will be requested. To disable a placement, use the 'Active' property.
Enter a value greater than or equal to 1. By default, 20 ads will be requested. To disable a placement, use the 'Active' property.
admin/vtex-vtex-ads.common.categoryNameA: [Advanced] Use this field on pages without context where a category needs to be forced for the banner or in specific cases.
admin/vtex-vtex-ads.shelf.title: VTEX Ads - Shelf
admin/vtex-vtex-ads.shelf.placementNameA: By default, 'placement_product_default' will be used. Prefer the name registered in the ad platform.
admin/vtex-vtex-ads.sponsoredBrand.title: VTEX Ads - Sponsored Brand
admin/vtex-vtex-ads.sponsoredBrand.place: If you don't have a placement name registered in the theme or admin, 'placement_sb_default' will be used by default. Prefer the name registered in the ad platform.
admin/vtex-vtex-ads.banner.title: VTEX Ads - Banner
admin/vtex-vtex-ads.banner.placementName: By default, 'placement_banner_default' will be used. Prefer the name registered in the ad platform.
admin/vtex-vtex-ads.banner.sizeAdmin.des: Use the same size registered in the ad platform. By default, the value 'banner' will be used.
admin/vtex-vtex-ads.banner.sizeMobileAdm: Use the same size registered in the ad platform. If not provided, the 'Desktop Media Size' value will be used.
admin/vtex-vtex-ads.search.title: VTEX Ads - Search
admin/vtex-vtex-ads.search.placementName: By default, 'placement_search_default' will be used. Prefer the name registered in the ad platform.
admin/vtex-vtex-ads.search.tagPosition.d: Indicate where the tag should be displayed within the product card
admin/vtex-vtex-ads.search.tagText.title: Sponsored Tag Text
admin/vtex-vtex-ads.search.tagText.descr: By default, 'sponsored' will be used with automatic translation. To replace it, fill in this field.
admin/vtex-vtex-ads.search.parentSearchS: [Advanced] This field should only be edited by developers. By default, '.vtex-search-result-3-x-searchResultContainer #gallery-layout-container' will be used.
Use only the first SKU. If checked, only the first SKU of the product will be used for search in Newtail. If unchecked, all SKUs of the product will be used for search in Newtail.
